name: WONK - Aretha Wonk uses the internet
name_original: WONK - Aretha Wonk uses the internet
description:
Play as Aretha Wonk, a woman of old age hoping to enter the world of computers. Dodge viruses, write articles and letters and navigate a difficult digital world in this investigative game. Hopefully you will not waste your pension on scams.

Move: WASD/Arrow keys
Interact: E/Enter/Space

Gameplay: At first, you should familiarize yourself with the environment – especially the inbox. Try to find clues that can help you progress. When you subscribe to software, there will usually be a way to cancel your subscription. To make up for lost money, you can write articles for the Oldie News.
